About

Passionate developer based in Los Angeles with a balanced body of work in web and app user interfaces of varying complexity. Advanced knowledge of key development patterns, as well as strong instincts with respect to clean UI and optimized user experience.

What I do

Responsive Design

I work with popular responsive UI toolsets including Bootstrap, Foundation, Sass/LESS for mobile-first and progressive web apps.

Frameworks

JavaScript is more powerful than ever. I frequently leverage the latest libraries and frameworks including Angular, React, Ionic and more.

Optimization

Performance is a critical UX and conversion metric. I invest thoroughly into optimizing for lightweight, progressive, modular and maintainable code.



User Interface & UX

I prototype functional and beautiful user interfaces based on branding and business requirements.

Workflow

Version control, unit testing, as well as popular task runners, transpilers and package managers.

Ecommerce

Half a decade of experience working in the ecommerce space; Shopify, Magento, WooCommerce and more.

Open Source Projects

Promathius Web Game

A turn-based strategy game built in PHP and MySQL, leveraging a standard HTML/CSS/Javascript frontend (with a few experiments using Cordova for the mobile app).


Signicant enhancements since it's predecessor. Features separation between backend and front-end code using the Smarty Template Engine. Significant portions of the game engine were rewritten to be more modular. Game configurations are separated into user-friendly .ini configs. Also features significant performance enhancements, automatically compressing and minifing JS and CSS, as well as caching re-usable elements.

Angular Commerce

A dynamic ecommerce front-end framework using AngularJS and the Moltin API. Supports standard ecommerce functionality such as categories, product lists, cart panel, checkout and payment.

Shopify Variant Plugin

Shopify currently lacks the option to feature multiple variant-specific images. This plugin addresses that issue by providing an easy to implement JS snippet that can filter images based on the Shopify alt tag.

RealHer - Branded Ecommerce

RealHer is a cosmetics brand that donates 20% of its profits to charity. I was responsible for the development and launch of the ecommerce site and was involved for approximately 8 months.

View website Close

Noggin Nosh Snack Bar - Branded WordPress

Noggin Nosh is a nutrient dense superfood bar intended to support immediate and long-term improvement in terms of cognitive ability. This project involved creating a static page for its initial launch written in pure HTML without a CMS and was then redesigned for WordPress.

View website Close

True Girl Skincare - Ecommerce Website

Inspired by one of her teenagers, True Girl’s founder Joanne Vaden went on a mission to create the perfect skin care for teenage skin. I was responsible for developing and completing the entire ecommerce frontend.

View website Close

SkinDoctor - Hybrid Web/Mobile App

SkinDoctor, developed by Skin Nutrition, is a revolutionary new web app that will help users to intuitively self diagnose their skin type and receive automatic product and skincare recommendations. I am currently the lead front end engineer for this project.

Company website Close

Promathius Web Game

A turn-based strategy game built in PHP and MySQL, leveraging a standard HTML/CSS/Javascript frontend (with a few experiments using Cordova for the mobile app).

View github repo Close

Angular Commerce

An ecommerce front-end framework using AngularJS and the Moltin API. Supports standard ecommerce functionality such as categories, product lists, cart panel, checkout and payment.

View github repo Close

Shopify Multiple Variants Plugin

Shopify currently lacks the option to feature multiple variant-specific images. This plugin addresses that issue by providing easy to implement JS snippet that can filter images based on the Shopify alt tag.

View github repo Close
